meanings.definition: The process of growing plants without soil, using nutrient-rich water instead.
meanings.sent1: Hydroponics allows plants to grow without needing soil.
meanings.sent2: Many farmers use hydroponics to grow vegetables indoors.
meanings.sent3: The hydroponics system in the greenhouse made the plants look like they were floating in water.
meanings.sent4: In the world of hydroponics, plants thrive in a water-based paradise.
meanings.sent5: The concept of hydroponics revolutionized the way we think about traditional farming methods.

meanings.definition: The cultivation of plants in a nutrient solution rather than in soil.
meanings.sent1: Hydroponics is a method of plant cultivation that doesn't involve soil.
meanings.sent2: The hydroponics setup in the lab ensures the plants receive all the necessary nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The scientist accidentally spilled the hydroponics solution, creating a mini indoor pond.
meanings.sent4: The hydroponics garden was a vibrant sea of green, thriving without any soil in sight.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of hydroponics lies in its ability to sustain plant growth without traditional soil requirements.
